item.title: Next fall, every school district in Florida is required to set up an online school for K-8
item.description:
[In Florida, virtual school could make classrooms history -- OrlandoSentinel.com][] > A new law that takes effect next fall requires every district in the > state to set up an online school for kindergarten through eighth-grade > students. >

This is fascinating to me, and I'm surprised that this didn't get more news coverage â€¦
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
